pages.title: Raffle Vaults
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Ancient Vaults$() are a special Vault where you need to rescue up to $(#033dfc)4 Ancient Eternals$(), spawning in Ancient Cryo chambers that are randomly scattered in $(#033dfc)the Vault$().

pages.title: Mechanics
pages.text: Ancient Vaults have Custom generation, spawning Vault Rooms right next to eachother, without any Hallways and always spawn in a Square $(l:the_vault/vault_layout)Layout$(), in addition to that, you only have $(#033dfc)15 minutes$() of Vault time..$(br2)Upon exiting with at least one Eternal, you will be rewarded with a $(#033dfc)Vault Crate$() containing a $(#033dfc)Shulker Box$() with loot for each $(#033dfc)Eternal$() you rescued.

To roll this Objective, you need to apply a $(#033dfc)Seal of the Explorer$() to a $(l:get_started/vault_crystal)Vault Crystal$() if the Crystal is not exhausted.$(br)These Seals may be $(#033dfc)crafted$() or obtained by other methods, like $(#033dfc)looting in the Vault$() or purchasing them in the $(#033dfc)Soul Shard Shop$()
